channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - test

item.title: Testing with permissive domains
item.description: When testing out new technologies or new setups, not having (proper) SELinux policies can be a nuisance. Not only are the number of SELinux policies that are available through the standard repositories limited, some of these policies are not even written with the same level of confinement that an administrator …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: New SELinux userspace release
item.description: A new release of the SELinux userspace utilities was recently announced. I have made the packages for Gentoo available and they should now be in the main tree (\~arch of course). During the testing of the packages however, I made a stupid mistake of running the tests on the wrong …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
